parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.92

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>serverExec</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Weapons

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets a guided missile target. Doesn't work for all types of missiles. If target is dead, target is ignored. The target has to be inside configured missile targeting cone for command to work.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> munition [[setMissileTarget]] target

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> munition: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> target: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] - [[true]] if succeessful

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>missile1 [[setMissileTarget]] tank1;</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_missile = [[createVehicle]] ["Missile_AGM_01_F",[[player]] [[modelToWorld]] [0,0,50],[],0,"CAN_COLLIDE"];
_missile [[setDir]] [[getDir]] [[player]];
_tgt = [[createVehicle]] ["O_APC_Wheeled_02_rcws_v2_F",[[player]] [[modelToWorld]] [0,300,0],[],0,"CAN_COLLIDE"];
_tgt [[setVehicleTiPars]] [1,1,1];
[_missile,_tgt] [[spawn]] {
	[[params]] ["_missile","_tgt"];
	[[sleep]] 0.1;
	_missile [[setMissileTarget]] _tgt;
};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[missileTargetPos]] [[setMissileTargetPos]] [[missileTarget]]
</value></part></template>



<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]</root>
